hello world component (none)
helloworldcomponent (normal)
hello.world.component (normalDotCase)
hello-world-component (normalKebabCase)
hello_world_component (normalSnakeCase)

helloWorldComponent (camelCase)
HelloWorldComponent (pascalCase)
HELLOWORLDCOMPONENT (upperCase)
helloworldcomponent (lowerCase)

hello_world_component (snakeCase)
hello-world-component (kebabCase)
hello.world.component (dotCase)

hello-World-Component (camelSnakeCase)
Hello_World_Component (pascalSnakeCase)
HELLO_WORLD_COMPONENT (upperSnakeCase)
hello_world_component (lowerSnakeCase)

hello-World-Component (camelKebabCase)
Hello-World-Component (pascalKebabCase)
HELLO-WORLD-COMPONENT (upperKebabCase)
hello-world-component (lowerKebabCase)

hello.World.Component (camelDotCase)
Hello.World.Component (pascalDotCase)
HELLO.WORLD.COMPONENT (upperDotCase)
